## ResourceManager.getPropertyName() method

Get the canonical path for a property accessor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPropertyName(prop: PropertyAccessor): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

prop


</td><td>

[PropertyAccessor](doc/markdown/./scene.propertyaccessor.md)


</td><td>

Property accessor.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The canonical path, or `null` if unknown.

## Remarks

Returns a string like `/ClassName/propName` if the property is registered.
